articles.title: SpaceX Changes to Starlink Satellites Earn Astronomers’ Praise - The New York Times
articles.description: Some astronomers who have criticized the company’s orbital internet constellation were encouraged by the measures it announced.
articles.content:
Perhaps the night sky has been saved.
SpaceX, the private rocket company founded by Elon Musk, announced changes last week to a constellation of tens of thousands of internet satellites it plans to send to orbit. The alterations could prevent these false sta… [+6028 chars]

articles.title: After 60 Years, Explosion-Powered Rockets Are Nearly Here - WIRED
articles.description: Rotating detonation engines could make rockets lighter, faster, and simpler. First imagined in the 1950s, now they’re almost ready for their first flight.
articles.content: For most aerospace engineers, an explosion in a rocket engine is a disaster. But for Kareem Ahmed, its the entire point. As the director of the Propulsion and Energy Research Laboratory at the University of Central Florida, Ahmed has spent the last few years … [+3565 chars]

articles.title: Yellowstone volcano: USGS records 134 earthquakes across park - Warning sign of eruption? - Express.co.uk
articles.description: YELLOWSTONE was rocked by 134 earthquakes last month, including a swarm of 20 tremors - but could the seismicity be a sign of Yellowstone volcano waking up?
